member.name: T:Quark.Projectiles.Projectile
member.summary: Projectile class provides interface for MissileController objects to access to properties about the projectile It also retrieves necessary movement vector or position vector and moves the carrier object appropriately It is also responsible for handling the collisions and target checks

member.summary: The near enough distance constant which indicates that a missile will consider itself reached to a target point

member.summary: This field stores the stacking behavior of this Buff. See

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.Buff.MakeID(Quark.Buffs.Buff,Quark.Spells.Cast)
member.summary: Makes an Identifier from a Buff and Cast instances

member.summary: Makes an Identifier from a Buff and an identifier for a Cast context

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.Buff.SetContext(Quark.Spells.Cast)
member.summary: Sets the Cast context where this Buff runs in

member.name: F:Quark.Buffs.Buff._posessionTime
member.summary: This variable is stored for calculating the alive time of the Buff instances

member.name: F:Quark.Buffs.Buff._lastTick
member.summary: This variable is stored for checking whether the Tick method should be called or not in a given frame

member.name: F:Quark.Buffs.Buff._terminated
member.summary: This flag stores whether this Buff got terminated in the last Tick

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.Buff.Terminate
member.summary: Immediately terminates this Buff. Termination assures no other Tick will take place in this instance.

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.Buff.ResetBeginning
member.summary: Resets the possession time of this Buff, practically resetting its lifetime

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.Buff.Tick
member.summary: This function controls the state of the buff for whether it should call the OnTick function in this frame or not and also it checks if it has completed its lifespan or not

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.Buff.Register
member.summary: Register proper events to the Messenger. This method should not contain any gameplay related logic Refer to the OnPossess() for gameplay logic on possession

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.Buff.Deregister
member.summary: Deregister pre registered events from the messenger.

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.Buff.Possess(Quark.Character)
member.summary: Begin the posession logic of this Buff

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.Buff.OnPossess
member.summary: This event handler is called right after the owning BuffContainer possesses this buff

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.Buff.OnStack
member.summary: This event is raised when an existing Buff is attached again

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.Buff.OnTick
member.summary: Handles the tick event

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.Buff.OnDone
member.summary: Executes the finalization logic of this buff

member.name: M:Quark.Buffs.Buff.OnTerminate
member.summary: Executes the termination logic of this buff

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff.Name
member.summary: Name of this Buff.

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff.Identifier
member.summary: Returns this Buffs identifier

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff.LifeRatio
member.summary: This ratio indicates the rate of its alive time to its total duration

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff.Alive
member.summary: The time span in seconds where this Buff was running

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff.CleanedUp
member.summary: This flag stores whether this Buff is ready to be garbage collected

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff.PossessEffects
member.summary: These effects are applied when this Buff is first possessed

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff.StackEffects
member.summary: These effects are applied when another instance of this Buff is attached to the possessor

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff.TickEffects
member.summary: These effects are applied on every interval

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff.DoneEffects
member.summary: These effects are applied when this Buff finishes its life time successfully

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff.TerminateEffects
member.summary: These effeccts are applied when this Buff terminates (fails finish its life time)

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff.DoneConditions
member.summary: These conditions are checked to determine whether this Buff should be done

member.name: P:Quark.Buffs.Buff.TerminateConditions
member.summary: These conditions are checked to determine whether this Buff should terminate

member.name: T:Quark.Buffs.StackBehavior
member.summary: This enumeration dictates how a given Buff should respond in a stacking situation

member.name: F:Quark.Buffs.StackBehavior.ResetBeginning
member.summary: In the case of stacking, the Buff should reset its possession time.

member.name: F:Quark.Buffs.StackBehavior.IncreaseStacks
member.summary: In the case of stacking, the Buff should increase its stack count.

member.name: F:Quark.Buffs.StackBehavior.Nothing
member.summary: In the case of stacking, the Buff shouldn't respond.

member.summary: Introduce the Cast context which is invoking this Spell instance.

member.summary: Executes the spell cast beginning logic.

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.OnTargetingDone
member.summary: Executes the spell targeting done logic.

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.OnFinal
member.summary: Executes the ClearEffects then purges itself from the Cast context it is associated with

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.CollectProjectile(Quark.Projectiles.Projectile)
member.summary: Collects a projectile which were created by this spell

member.name: M:Quark.Spells.Spell.CreateProjectiles
member.summary: Invokes necessary projectiles for this spell

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.CastDuration
member.summary: Gets or Sets the duration of the cast.

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.CastingInterval
member.summary: This field determines the interval of the OnCasting logic to run while this Spell is being casted.

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.TravelingInterval
member.summary: This field determines the interval of the OnTravel logic to run while a projectile belonging to this Spell is traveling.

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.Name
member.summary: Name of the Spell

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.TargetForm
member.summary: Gets the target form of this spell

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.TargetMacro
member.summary: Gets the target macro of this Spell

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.IsInstant
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this spell is instant.
member.value: true if this spell is instant; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.IsProjectiled
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this spell invokes projectiles.
member.value: true if this instance has projectiles; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.InvokeEffects
member.summary: The begin effects. Effects within this list are applied with the caster Character object argument when the castdata is initialized

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.TargetingDoneEffects
member.summary: The targeting done effects. Effects within this list are applied with each of the target Character objects and Vector objects, depending on the type of the spell

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.CastingBeginEffects
member.summary: The casting began effects Effects within this list are applied after targeting done and casting began, these effects are not executed for instant spells

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.CastingEffects
member.summary: The casting effects Effects within this list are applied while the casting occurs

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.CastDoneEffects
member.summary: The casting done effects Effects within this list are applied when the casting successfully finishes

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.InterruptEffects
member.summary: The interruption effects Effects within this list are applied if the spell gets interrupted either by the caster or other Characters

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.TravelEffects
member.summary: The traveling effects Effects within this list are applied while the projectiles of this Spell are traveling

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.HitEffects
member.summary: The on-hit effects Effects within this list are applied when a successful hit occurs

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.MissEffects
member.summary: The spell miss effects Effects within this list are applied when a projectile gets destroyed without hitting any characters

member.name: P:Quark.Spells.Spell.ClearEffects
member.summary: The finalizing effects Effects within this list are applied just before the spell gets collected by the GC

member.name: F:Quark.Targeting.TargetForm.Singular
member.summary: May hit multiple characters

member.name: F:Quark.Targeting.TargetForm.Plural
member.summary: May not hit multiple characters

member.name: F:Quark.Spells.Cast.HitCount
member.summary: The total hit count in this context.

member.name: T:Quark.EffectCollection
member.summary: This class is designed for containing, mutating and running some effects It is useful for storing event handling effects The family of Run functions return the instance itself so the running of the effects on multiple target types can be serialized like: Container.Run().Run(character).Run(point)... etc.

member.name: M:Quark.EffectCollection.#ctor
member.summary: Initialize a new effect collection

member.name: M:Quark.EffectCollection.Add(Quark.Effect)
member.summary: Add a new effect to this collection

member.name: M:Quark.EffectCollection.Run(Quark.Spells.Cast)
member.summary: Run the effects contained in this collection with no target
member.param: The Cast context for the Effects to run

member.name: M:Quark.EffectCollection.Run(UnityEngine.Vector3,Quark.Spells.Cast)
member.summary: Apply the effects contained in this collection with a single Point target
member.param: The Cast context for the Effects to run

member.name: M:Quark.EffectCollection.Run(Quark.Character,Quark.Spells.Cast)
member.summary: Apply the effects contained in this collection with a single Character target
member.param: The Cast context for the Effects to run

member.name: M:Quark.EffectCollection.Run(Quark.Targetable,Quark.Spells.Cast)
member.summary: Apply the effects contained in this collection with a single Targetable target
member.param: The Cast context for the Effects to run

member.name: M:Quark.EffectCollection.Run(UnityEngine.Vector3[],Quark.Spells.Cast)
member.summary: Apply the effects contained in this collection with a collection of Point targets
member.param: The Cast context for the Effects to run

member.name: M:Quark.EffectCollection.Run(Quark.Character[],Quark.Spells.Cast)
member.summary: Apply the effects contained in this collection with a collection of Character targets
member.param: The Cast context for the Effects to run

member.name: M:Quark.EffectCollection.Run(Quark.Targetable[],Quark.Spells.Cast)
member.summary: Apply the effects contained in this collection with a collection of Targetable targets
member.param: The Cast context for the Effects to run

member.name: T:Quark.Symbol
member.summary:
This class is the building block of expressions.
It can be an interaction, constant or other custom calculation such as another expression.

member.name: T:Quark.ConstantSymbol
member.summary: This class represents only a constant value.

member.name: T:Quark.InteractionSymbol
member.summary:
This class represents an attribute interaction of a given source.
It depends either on the caster or target depending on the source, and the value it yields is the interaction result.

member.summary: Adds a constant symbol to this expression.

member.summary: Adds an arbitrary symbol to this expression.

member.summary: Adds an attribute interaction to this expression.
